title: Hour 1: Hail Murray
description:
In this episode, Bart Scott, Robert Griffin III, and Kimberly A. Martin react to Kyler Murray's big payday as he agrees to a contract extension with the Cardinals. The crew discusses where this news leaves the Ravens and Lamar Jackson in their contract negotiations and if Lamar is the right guy for Baltimore. Also debated is who will feel more impacted by their recent breakup: Aaron Rodgers or Davante Adams? Mecole Hardman joins the show to give his take on how the Chiefs will stack up in the AFC this year without Tyreek Hill.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Did Kyler Murray earn his contract extension with the Cardinals?
